item.title: This Startup Says AI Clones of Your Employees Will Boost Productivity. Here’s How

item.title: 8 Tips for Implementing a Smart and Sustainable AI Plan
item.description: Before you embark on an uncertain AI journey, you need a set of clear objectives, a roadmap, and a cap on costs.

item.title: The Stock Market Has Completely Erased Its October Sell-Off

item.title: Science Says Every Meeting Should Always Start on Time (If You Want It to Actually Be Productive)
item.description: Research shows meetings that start on time are significantly more productive. So why do so few meetings actually kick off when scheduled?
